question: The headquarter of Inland Waterways Authorities of India (IWAI) is located at which of the following places of India?
explanation: IWAI was established in the year 1986 (27th October). The headquarter of IWAI is located at Noida (Uttar Pradesh). The regional offices of IWAI are located in Guwahati, Kochi, Patna and Kolkata.
